body:
Hi!

I was an old active player of server, and now i'm back
I am not well known in the community, but probably you remember me playing here a few months ago

In this post, my principal intention is introduce myself, but if you want to ask me something through this post, you can do it :)


Some facts about me:

-I'm 16 years old

-I'm From Argentina, but as you can see I have no problems to communicating in English.

-Currently i'm member of Coffee, a spanish-speaking team


Thank you for reading.
Regards!

title: Hey! I'm TheJoseph21 [Introducing & AMA]

replies.body:
Hey dude I'm a random guy who plays on avicus!!!!

Welcome back!!!

Favorite food? Color? Movie?
